snippet: The flux of newly opened bars-within-bars gives cocktail aficionados a quieter atmosphere and bartenders a chance to experiment.
abstract: Secret bars hidden within larger bars or restaurants are capitalizing on patrons' desire for exclusivity and are allowing tavern-keepers and mixologists to realize specialized and visionary ambitions.
lead_paragraph: The flux of newly opened bars-within-bars gives cocktail aficionados a quieter atmosphere and bartenders a chance to experiment.

headline.main: Your New Favorite Bar? Inside Your Old Favorite Bar
headline.print_headline: An Oasis Within a Watering Hole

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Jack Rose Dining Saloon (Washington, DC, Bar)
